#!perl

# This file was automatically generated by Dist::Zilla::Plugin::Test::Map::Tube v0.12.

use strict; use warnings;
use utf8;
use Test::More;

eval "use Test::Map::Tube 0.17 tests => 3";
plan skip_all => "Test::Map::Tube 0.17 required" if $@;

use Sample::Map;

my $map = Sample::Map->new;

ok_map($map);

ok_map_functions($map);

open(IN, '<:encoding(UTF-8)', "t/routes.txt") or die "Can't open routes file: $!\n"; my @routes = <IN>; close(IN);

ok_map_routes($map, \@routes);
